item.description: Let's make a Saturday afternoon trip way out to Keene. We could leave at noon for their big time Pmpkin Festival. http://pumpkinfestiva... I want to try my hand at Pumpkin Bowling.... "... Pumpkin Bowling 2pm Location: West Street, after the parade clears the area Real bowling pins, actual scorekeeping, the only difference is, instead of bowling balls, we'll be bowling with pumpkins--the extra hard, cooking pumpkins. We're introducing the sport of pumpkin bowling and offering it right in the middle of one of New Hampshire's busiest streets" I'll need to figure out a taxi or loaner car. Please RSVP early. Thanks. ( One of these days I'll figure out how to add a photo using my iPad ) Sounds fun... An added bonus... We could leave earlier for a late breakfast to somewhere else... Maybe leave at 10:00 a.m. For Auburn Lewiston or Nashua or somewhere else first.???? You decide when you RSVP. Another interactive Fly Out :-) Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Keene's Crazy Pumpkin Festival
